Ice skaters Jayne Torvill and Christopher Dean become a dame and knight in the New Year Honours list, while England women's manager Sarina Wiegman is made an honorary dame.

items.ja: Man Utd sign Germany international Schuller
items.en: Man Utd sign Germany international Schuller
items.text_for_match: Man Utd sign Germany international Schuller Manchester United have signed Germany international Lea Schuller from Bayern Munich until June 2029. Manchester United have signed Germany international Lea Schuller from Bayern Munich until June 2029.

items.ja: Passmoor wants to stabilise Leicester as legacy
items.en: Passmoor wants to stabilise Leicester as legacy
items.text_for_match: Passmoor wants to stabilise Leicester as legacy Leicester City manager Rick Passmoor says his aim was to "stabilise" the club in his first few months in charge and hopes to leave a legacy for others to follow. items.ja: Jota's widow thanks Liverpool fans for their 'love'
items.en: Jota's widow thanks Liverpool fans for their 'love'
items.text_for_match: Jota's widow thanks Liverpool fans for their 'love' Rute Cardoso says it has been an "incredibly difficult time" after Jota's death in a car crash. Rute Cardoso says it has been an "incredibly difficult time" after Jota's death in a car crash.

items.ja: Jota's children lead tributes before Liverpool v Wolves
items.en: Jota's children lead tributes before Liverpool v Wolves
items.text_for_match: Jota's children lead tributes before Liverpool v Wolves Liverpool and Wolves pay tribute to Diogo Jota as his two former sides meet for the first time since his death. items.ja: The best wonderkids outside big five leagues
items.en: The best wonderkids outside big five leagues
items.text_for_match: The best wonderkids outside big five leagues There are plenty of wonderkids catching the eye outside of Europe's big-five leagues - BBC Sport takes a look at the top 10 as ranked by the CIES Football Observatory research group. items.ja: Jota's sons to join mascots for Liverpool v Wolves
items.en: Jota's sons to join mascots for Liverpool v Wolves
items.text_for_match: Jota's sons to join mascots for Liverpool v Wolves Diogo Jota's sons will accompany the matchday mascots as the Portuguese's two former sides - Liverpool and Wolves - meet for the first time since his death.
